column2: # want to define a function that for alpha and n can give KS bands just like how my other function returns them
## Note: I need to figure out how to get this table for other values of alpha, but for testing this is fine
ks_crit_val <- approx.ksD(n) # gets the KS critical value
mid_vec_lower <- seq(from = 1, to = n, by = 1) / n # will get the middle value of the distribution
mid_vec_upper <- seq(from = 0, to = n - 1, by = 1) / n
